def onFinishBattle(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): questProgress = quest_progress.BaseQuestProgress(quest.config, processor.getQuestProgress(quest.progressID))

timeLimit = questProgress.getProgress(KILLS_IN_BATTLE).getCountDown() kills = sum(1 for event in brfilter.filterDamageTo(result='killed', time=timeLimit).itervalues())
if questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(KILLS_IN_BATTLE, kills): questProgress.increaseUntilComplete(KILLS_IN_BATTLE_SERIES, 1)
eventData['results'].update(processor.checkComplete(questProgress, quest.progressID, additionalProgressID=WIN_SERIES))

def onInit(eventType, eventData, quest, processor): for event in events.iterkeys(): processor.subscribe(event, quest) return True
